statements: DELETE FROM wrestlers WHERE wrestler_name = 'John Cena';
DELETE FROM wrestlers WHERE wrestler_id = 10 AND salary > 5000 OR expiry_date < '2022-10-01'
DELETE FROM wrestlers WHERE special_clauses LIKE '%no-compete%' AND (salary < 3000 OR expiry_date > '2023-01-01')
DELETE FROM contracts WHERE contract_id IN (SELECT contract_id FROM contracts WHERE contract_length < 2);
DELETE FROM wrestlers WHERE wrestler_id = 100 AND expiry_date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM Titles WHERE title_name = 'Heavyweight Champion';
DELETE FROM Contracts WHERE wrestler_id = 5 AND start_date < '2023-01-01';
